job_description:
- Record and summarize painting/coating data such as surface area, materials used, and daily progress.
- Assist in inputting painting-related reports into the system.
- Prepare supporting documents for painting inspections, including WQT records, checklists, and QC reports.
- Coordinate with QC Painting Inspectors and Supervisors regarding documentation needs.
- Perform administrative tasks related to Painting activities as required.
